info.sourceTextContent: Respecto a su padre, todo lo tenía previsto: lo que había de hacerse era tan sencillo como triste; trasladarle en una camilla a casa de Engracia, y llevar luego su cama, sus ropas y algunos muebles, más útiles para conservados que para vendidos.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Regarding his father, had everything planned: what was was made as simple as sad a stretcher to transport you on Engracia house, and carry then his bed, his clothes and some furniture, preserved more useful than for sellers
